query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Hincasting methods for SO2 dispersion models
result.description: This Deliverable will contain: - a cover page with the title of the deliverable, deliverable number, project information (acronym, grant number, call, topic), consortium coordinator information, edition date and number; - authoring and approval data sheet, with the names of the authors, reviewers internal to the project, approval by PC, Task Leader and WP Leader, eventual rejection by any representative of the beneficiaries, and document history. - the abstract of ALARM project. - An executive summary of the Deliverable, highlighting the contributions, main results and conclusions, and some insight on how this deliverable will be feeding other tasks within the project. - An introduction to the topic, including the motivation and goals of the deliverable. - the methodological approach to the conduction of Task 3.1 (Identify observational training dataset) and Task 3.2 (Access model (hind/forecast) data). - the results derived from these tasks. - Concluding remarks

result.title: Case study 3 report “Assessing overall system costs due to massive RES integration”
result.description: D.2.4 Case study 3 report “Assessing overall system costs due to massive RES integration” (M36-EDF): Report under task T2.5 that documents the results from case study 3 “Assessing overall costs of the European electricity system in a future scenario with high share of renewable”. The report describes the resulting adaptation costs : network cost, margin and flexibility costs, costs to ensure dynamic robustness of the system in future scenarii (2050) where climate changes are or are not integrated.

result.title: Public dataset and document ‘how this dataset was built’
result.description: D.4.5 Public dataset and document ‘how this dataset was built’ (dataset+report) (M30-ICOOR): This is the final deliverable of WP4. It consists of the complete public dataset plus a report which describes: the identification of the source data; the acquisition phase; the coherent scenario generation; the data cleaning and formatting.

result.title: Dissemination and communication activity v2
result.description: This report will provide evidences on dissemination and exploitation actions conducted by the consortium as a whole and per single participant. A specific section will be dedicated to open information management activity. Finally performances indicators (see Section 2.2) related to dissemination and exploitation will be reported and commented. Together with the report will be provided all the dissemination and communication material that will be produced by the consortium (webinars, videos, etc.)
